title.native: 名探偵コナン 時計じかけの摩天楼
title.romaji: Meitantei Conan: Tokei Jikake no Matenrou
title.english: Case Closed: The Time Bombed Skyscraper

description: Taking the original story of Detective Conan, this first Conan film follows his adventures as he struggles to find and capture a mad bomber who's loose in his home town. Chasing bomb after bomb, Conan must stop him before he destroys a skyscraper in the middle of the city, which has the potential to cause millions of dollars in damage and kill hundreds. Who's planting the bombs? What are his motives? Gather clues with Conan and find out!
synonyms: Detective Conan Movie 01: The Timed Skyscraper
Case Closed The Movie: The Time Bombed Skyscraper
Meitantei Conan Movie 01: Tokei Jikake no Matenrou
Detective Conan Movie 01: Fino alla fine del tempo

node.description:
__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.

__Favorite Food:__ Rice with curry

Gosho Aoyama, alternatively known by his real name Yoshimasa Aoyama, is a Japanese mangaka and animator, best known as the creator of Detective Conan (internationally known as Case Closed), Magic Kaito, and YAIBA.

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%93%E3%81%A0%E3%81%BE%E5%85%BC%E5%97%A3) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kenji_Kodama)

Kenji Kodama is a Japanese director and storyboard artist. He is best known for being one of the main directors on the long-running anime [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/), as well as the [City Hunter](https://anilist.co/anime/1470/) series and [Lupin III: Part III](https://anilist.co/anime/1426/).

Married to animator [Sachiko Kamimura](https://anilist.co/staff/112663/).

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%93%E3%81%A0%E3%81%BE%E5%85%BC%E5%97%A3) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kenji_Kodama)

Kenji Kodama is a Japanese director and storyboard artist. He is best known for being one of the main directors on the long-running anime [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/), as well as the [City Hunter](https://anilist.co/anime/1470/) series and [Lupin III: Part III](https://anilist.co/anime/1426/).

Married to animator [Sachiko Kamimura](https://anilist.co/staff/112663/).

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%93%E3%81%A0%E3%81%BE%E5%85%BC%E5%97%A3) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kenji_Kodama)

Kenji Kodama is a Japanese director and storyboard artist. He is best known for being one of the main directors on the long-running anime [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/), as well as the [City Hunter](https://anilist.co/anime/1470/) series and [Lupin III: Part III](https://anilist.co/anime/1426/).

Married to animator [Sachiko Kamimura](https://anilist.co/staff/112663/).

(Source: Wikipedia)
Joined Audio Planning U in 1982, where he studied under [Yasuo Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/111277/).
Yamamoto Yasuichirou is a director. He is best known as the current director of the Meitantei Conan franchise.
Yamamoto Yasuichirou is a director. He is best known as the current director of the Meitantei Conan franchise.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/111102968)

Originating from Nakamura Production. A fast worker according to [Takashi Hashimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/118452/).
